CustomField.description: This is an integer that stores the number of business days AR Issued Dates will remain open for back dating into the previous month. Example: When set to 5, a user can set the an Issue Date to a date in the previous month until the 6th business day of the following month. At that time, Issue dates can no longer be set to the previous month.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is an integer that stores the number of business days AR Issued Dates will remain open for back dating into the previous month. Example: When set to 5, a user can set the an Issue Date to a date in the previous month until the 6th business day of the following month. At that time, Issue dates can no longer be set to the previous month.
CustomField.label: Days AR Issue Date Remain Open
